name: HEAVENS GUN - Game Jam
description:
CONTROLS: 

Arrow keys - Movement

Z - Fire Shotgun

X - Reload when standing

When a mobster is sent to hell for his dastardly deeds, he's given a shot at redemption. Or should I say, a SHOTGUN at redemption? 

Use your shotgun to kill demons and propel yourself all the way up to heaven. Show God what it's like when you mess with Mobster McGee.
